misc: Bags Miura irons and is rumoured to sleep with them.
biography: Miso, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is known for his intense dedication to the sport and, according to some, an even more intense attachment to his Miura irons, which he purportedly sleeps with to maintain peak performance.

Representing Hirsala Golf, Miso has been a consistent presence in this competition, showcasing his skills and passion for the game. With 9 past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Miso is gearing up for his tenth appearance in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025.
Miso's perseverance paid off when he and his teammate secured the coveted Hector Trophée. While the Victor Trophy has eluded him thus far, Miso undoubtedly has his eyes on claiming it in the future.
